success_criteria.notes: Success if the assistant creates a biweekly recurring one-on-one meeting series between Margaret and Jordan via create_recurring_meeting with a 45-minute duration, scheduled on Thursday after school hours.

task.objective: Set up a recurring biweekly literacy coaching one-on-one with Jordan

injected_behaviors.instructions: Margaret wants to set up a recurring biweekly coaching one-on-one with a new English teacher, Jordan Miller, to discuss lesson planning and reading strategies. She prefers Thursday after-school slots (between 3:30 pm and 5:00 pm) in the Portland (US/Pacific) time zone, but can shift to late Wednesday afternoons if needed. She would like the meetings to start in early January 2026 and run through the spring semester.
